mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.username AS "username", a.firstname AS "firstname", a.lastname AS "lastname", a.langcode AS "langcode", a.msg_time AS "msgTime", a.star AS "star", a.msg_num AS "msgNum", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.userstate as "userstate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_user( id, username, firstname, lastname, langcode, msg_time, star,msg_num, update_date,userstate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{firstname}, #{lastname}, #{langcode}, #{msgTime}, #{star}, #{msgNum}, #{updateDate},#{userstate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tl_user SET username = #{username}, firstname = #{firstname}, lastname = #{lastname}, langcode = #{langcode}, msg_time = #{msgTime}, star = #{star}, update_date = #{updateDate}, userstate=#{userstate} WHERE id = #{id}
